itemInfo.itemDesc:
A meat croquette fried to perfection. 
- Unique effect: Combat EXP Gain +5% for 110 min
- How to Obtain: It can be cooked at your residence.
- Cooldown: 30 min

item.name: Deep Frying Oil
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vender or Innkeeper.

item.name: Pork
item.desc:
A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be used in Cooking.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Butchering a pig corpse.

- Usage: Steak, Meat Stew, Meat Pasta, etc.

item.name: Wheat Flour
item.desc:
A fine flour made by Grinding.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Grinding Wheat.

- Usage: Essence of Liquor, Meat Stew, Oatmeal, etc.

item.name: Cheese
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking. This can be created by Drying milk received from a farm Quest.\n\n- Usage: Fish Filet Salad, Cheese Gratin, etc.

item.name: Egg
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking. It can be received from a farm Quest.\n\n- Usage: Soft Bread, Omelet, etc.

item.name: Deep Frying Oil
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vender or Innkeeper.
